cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Dorms vary from three to six beds per room. Each unit has a fully equipped shared kitchen, lounge and bathroom facilities. All linen is supplied.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 30 nights stay on your dates

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable

Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Budget Twin rooms feature private bedrooms with twin beds. All of our Budget Twins are located in units with a fully-equipped shared kitchen, lounge and bathroom facilities. All linen and towels are supplied.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Ensuite Rooms consist of a double bed and a single bed, with tea & coffee making facilities and have their own private bathrooms. You will have access to a fully-equipped shared kitchen and lounge facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Superior 6 Bed Private Ensuite

privates.labelDescription: With a Queen Bed in the main room and two sets of bunks in another, fully-equipped kitchen, lounge and bathroom, itâ€™s everything you need to have a comfortable stay with stunning scenery to boot.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 4th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 4th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
